meanings.sent1: I am excited to start at the unis next week.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one.
meanings.sent1: She measured the ingredients using a unis of flour.
meanings.sent2: The length of the room was just one unis.
meanings.sent3: The recipe called for a unis of sugar, making it easy to follow.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was like a unis, always consistent and reliable.
meanings.sent5: The unis of distance between the two towns was surprisingly short.

meanings.definition: A type of clothing consisting of a single piece.
meanings.sent1: She wore a comfortable unis for the dance performance.
meanings.sent2: The unis she bought was perfect for the hot summer weather.
meanings.sent3: He joked that wearing a unis made him feel like a superhero.
